docs.title: Welcome to ZodKmp
docs.text: ZodKmp is a Kotlin Multiplatform implementation of the popular Zod TypeScript validation library. It provides a declarative, type-safe way to validate data in your Kotlin Multiplatform projects.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: To get started with ZodKmp, add the dependency to your project and start defining your schemas.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Type-safe validation
  • Cross-platform compatibility
  • Declarative API
  • Support for complex data structures

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Initial ZodKmp implementation
  • Support for basic validation types
  • Cross-platform compatibility
